title: Remove a Vehicle from an Auto Policy
description: A policyholder sold a car and no longer needs it on their policy.

tasks.description: Identify the policyholder and the specific vehicle to be removed.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent correctly identifies the account and the vehicle.

tasks.description: Remove the vehicle from the policy, effective today.
Recalculate the premium and inform the customer of their new, lower payment.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent provides the customer with their new premium amount.
